feed.title: Category: Meta | Paolo G. Giarrusso's blog & website

entry.title: Welcome to My New Blog!
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog! I am a PhD student in Programming Languages, and my blog will focus on programming, programming languages (especially Scala and Haskell) and my research interests.

After my last blog, I’ve finally decided to start blogging again. I’ve finally decided to switch to a Jekyll-style workflow (courtesy of Octopress).
